thread.title: Police, Texas vet save puppy from heroin overdose, owners arrested
thread.title_full: Police, Texas vet save puppy from heroin overdose, owners arrested

author: Heather Leighton, Houston Chronicle
title: Police, Texas vet save puppy from heroin overdose, owners arrested
text:
It's the Lone Star State. It's only natural that we love stars. 20) Star It's the Lone Star State. It's only natural that we love stars. Image 25 of 28 In honor of the Texas-born Lady Bird Johnson, of course. 21) Ladybird In honor of the Texas-born Lady Bird Johnson, of course. Image 26 of 28 Who, in Texas, doesn't love a little Willie Nelson? 22) Willie Who, in Texas, doesn't love a little Willie Nelson? Photo: Leslloyd F. Alleyne, MBO Image 27 of 28 Or any other major city name, for that matter. 23) Dallas Or any other major city name, for that matter. Photo: Katherine Via Flickr Police, Texas vet save puppy from heroin overdose, owners arrested 1 / 28 Back to Gallery 
Meet the Chihuahua mix that was lucky enough to be saved by a Texas police officer and veterinarian after suffering from a heroin overdose. 
Appropriately, the pooch was named "Lucky." A Carrollton Police Department officer spotted the dog on the floorboard of a parked truck at a local Home Depot parking lot. The pooch was suffering from a heroin overdose while police say its humans were busy inside the home-improvement store switching price tags. 
HAPPY DOG STORY: Thanks to community, stray dog finds home with Saint Arnold co-founder 
Lucky the puppy was taken by the police and the folks at the North Texas Emergency Pet Clinic in Carrollton were able to nurture the pup back to health. 
Dr. Stacie Fowler (DVM) works at the clinic and told Chron.com the 4-month-old dog was nearly comatose and "was pretty close to checking out." Through a series of medications administered to Lucky, he was able to recover from the overdose in 24 hours. An employee at the clinic told Chron.com that the pooch is now with Carrollton Animal Control, but they keep receiving calls for information about adopting the young dog. 
Thinking of getting a new furry friend in the coming year? Stumped on a name? Here are the top male and female dog names of 2016 to make your decision easier! Media: WochIt Media 
"He is adorable. He is a tiny little thing. probably only 4 months old and loves to give kisses and is wiggly and wags and is very, very sweet," Dr. Fowler told Chron.com. "He's recovered from something that could have been fatal and thanks to the police staff and the staff here he was able to come out of it." 
HOMEGROWN TEXAN: Dog names that define what it means to be from Texas 
The owners, on the other hand, weren't able to come out of the situation as luck as Lucky. Thomas Romero, 46, and Nina Crawford, 38, face charges of possession of a controlled substance/heroin and fraudulent destruction, removal or concealment of writing, according to the Star-Telegram .
